channel.title: Please! really need help with compiling noob question
channel.description: ok so I'm sure just about everyone here has done this at least once..... first off how come i get a different message for a different compiler? I'll get something like [code]the system could not find the path specified...[/code] or i get [code]you do not have jdk 5.0 or jdk 6.0 or any jdk 5.0 or jdk 6.0 updates. Go to mod tahrok's tutorial on the tutorial section of the moparscape website....(or something along these lines)[/code] i just don't get it.... can anyone help me? please? :(

item.title: Please! really need help with compiling noob question
item.dc:creator: @x-x-ben-x-x x-x-ben-x-x
item.description:
@x-x-ben-x-x wrote:

dudes ty ty ty mine as saying jdk 5.0 or jdk 6.0 ty it works now!!!

item.title: Please! really need help with compiling noob question
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Ok, Varii, Don’t hijack his thread, and that means it was SUCCESSFUL.

Bob…I did that a long time ago, when I was beginning private servers, I don’t know why, but I made a copy of what was in my Path in system variables, Try doing a system restore, When I replaced my Path I couldn’t open anything…or Firefox or IE.

Read full topic
item.source: Please! really need help with compiling noob question

item.title: Please! really need help with compiling noob question
item.dc:creator: @Varii Varii
item.description:
@Varii wrote:

Hey, I have had a slight problem too with compiling. Here is a picture of what it looks like (error) and my compiler.

My source is AdvancedScape:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: Please! really need help with compiling noob question
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Replace CLASSPATH with this: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

And PATH with this: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin

Read full topic

item.title: Please! really need help with compiling noob question
item.dc:creator: @pkerinferno pkerinferno
item.description:
@pkerinferno wrote:

Bobthecat, Hey… If you have downloaded jdk 6.3, Use this compiler

This works Perfectly It’s great:

Right Click ur compiler, Click edit, then replace Everything with that

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

This is one of them, change to: set pro=%pr%jre1.6.4 set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.4 or 6.5 if you have 6.5.[/quote]
